examples: That experience changed my life.
The storekeeper changed my dollar bill for four quarters.
Leaves change colour in autumn.
The wind has changed direction.
The lights changed to green.
words.defineEn: a process or result of becoming different
words.defineVi: một quá trình hoặc kết quả của việc trở nên khác biệt

examples: Which team won?
The team took a terrible beating.
The team finished the race in first place.
Our team actually won!
Both teams chanced their arms at every opportunity.
words.defineEn: a group of people who compete against another group in a sport or game
words.defineVi: một nhóm người thi đấu với một nhóm khác trong một môn thể thao hoặc trò chơi

examples: The company's new product launch led to a fat increase in revenue.
The product launch went out with a bang, with a viral social media campaign and record-breaking sales numbers.
The company's new product line contributed to a significant increase in its overall yield for the quarter.
The new smartphone had the edge over the last product, with its larger screen and faster processor.
The new product will soon be available in stores nationwide.
words.defineEn: something that is created or grown for sale
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó được tạo ra hoặc phát triển để bán

examples: The color green has a restful effect.
The ocean's blue color amazed us.
That color has gone out of fashion.
What is your favorite color?
The artist mixed different colors to create a masterpiece.
words.defineEn: a quality such as red, green, blue, yellow, etc. that we see when we look at something
words.defineVi: một phẩm chất chẳng hạn như đỏ, xanh lá cây, xanh dương, vàng, v.v. mà chúng ta thấy khi nhìn vào một thứ gì đó

examples: Right, pin back your ears, everyone.
That extension is busy right now.
I want a dish of creamy mushroom bucatini with Parmesan right now.
Right by holding the candle to the devil.
After the traffic lights, turn right.
words.defineEn: the direction or side that is toward the east when someone or something is facing north
words.defineVi: hướng hoặc mặt hướng về phía đông khi ai đó hoặc thứ gì đó hướng về phía bắc

examples: We want a deal.
The deal was completely open and above board.
You've got a deal!
Your friendship means a great deal to me.
She got the short end of the stick in the deal.
words.defineEn: (especially in business or politics) an agreement between two or more parties, on particular conditions
words.defineVi: (đặc biệt là trong kinh doanh hoặc chính trị) một thỏa thuận giữa hai hoặc nhiều bên, với những điều kiện cụ thể

examples: Enter these amounts on the credit side.
The chef sprinkled a generous amount of roe on the dish.
He poured a generous amount of treacle over his warm pancakes
They sprinkled a generous amount of caraway seeds over their roasted vegetables.
He spread a generous amount of tartar sauce on his fish sandwich.
words.defineEn: the total number or quantity of something
words.defineVi: tổng số hoặc số lượng của một cái gì đó

examples: The boss sure aired his lungs when we lost another customer!
The whole future of the project is still up in the air.
The scent of wild cherry blossoms filled the air, signaling the arrival of spring.
As I peel the Jaffa orange, its fragrant zest fills the air.
The scent of bergamot orange fills the air as I zest it over my freshly baked lemon bars.
words.defineEn: the mixture of gases in the atmosphere that we breathe
words.defineVi: hỗn hợp khí trong khí quyển mà chúng ta hít thở

examples: Our hearts go out to the families of the victims of this terrible tragedy.
They never lost heart, even in the face of adversity.
They pour out their hearts to God.
Please, open your hearts to these poor people.
And now the poor thing is crying his heart out.
words.defineEn: the body part that pushes the blood to go to all parts of our body
words.defineVi: bộ phận cơ thể đẩy máu đi đến tất cả các bộ phận của cơ thể chúng ta

examples: Lots of people had left comments under the post.
Her comment about my work piqued my anger.
Bob's comment must have been close to home.
The Youtube comment sowed a seed of anger and untold frustrations which brought some questions to the forefront of her mind.
No one at the company could be reached for comment.
words.defineEn: a spoken or written remark that expresses an opinion or reaction
words.defineVi: một nhận xét nói hoặc viết thể hiện một ý kiến hoặc phản ứng

examples: They topped fruit tarts with mango coulis.
The fish tacos were topped with tangy slaw and creamy sauce.
This dictionary goes on the top shelf.
We topped our baked potatoes with a generous drizzle of bechamel sauce.
Write your name at the top of the paper.
words.defineEn: the point or part of something that is the highest
words.defineVi: điểm hoặc một phần của một cái gì đó là cao nhất

examples: The scholarship fund had made a difference in a lot of people's lives.
Exercise can make a big difference to your state of health.
It could mean the difference between a red-letter day and an empty basket.
Make a difference by doing what?
He got the hook, reportedly due to differences with his co-star.
words.defineEn: the way that two or more people or things are different from each other
words.defineVi: cách mà hai hoặc nhiều người hoặc vật khác nhau

examples: The tragic event tore the community out of its sense of normalcy.
The center will serve the whole community.
Her groundbreaking research has revolutionized the scientific community.
The authorities have offered an olive branch to the community.
The judge's ruling carries significant weight in the legal community.
words.defineEn: a group of people who live in the same area
words.defineVi: một nhóm người sống trong cùng một khu vực

examples: These heroes courageously answered the call of duty.
The waiter patiently answered our questions about the ingredients in the dish.
Her answer is no.
No one knows the answer.
She guessed the answer straight away.
words.defineEn: something we say, write, or do when we are replying to a question
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó chúng tôi nói, viết, hoặc làm khi chúng tôi đang trả lời một câu hỏi

examples: A white blouse will show the blood.
Blue blood is no guarantee of any particular merit, competence, or expertise.
The nurse takes my blood pressure.
My aunt and I are related by blood.
The heart pumps blood throughout the body to provide oxygen and nutrients.
words.defineEn: the red liquid that the heart pumps through the body, carrying oxygen to and carbon dioxide from the tissues
words.defineVi: chất lỏng màu đỏ mà tim bơm qua cơ thể, mang oxy đến và carbon dioxide từ các mô

examples: The president has the wind at his back on this issue.
The new president takes office in January.
The President runs the risk of assassination with every public appearance.
The rumors eventually reached the President.
The President handed over the baton to his successor.
words.defineEn: the leader of a country that has no king or queen
words.defineVi: lãnh đạo của một quốc gia không có vua hay nữ hoàng

examples: The baby had chubby cheeks and a cute face.
The baby cried its head off.
The baby has brought them great joy.
The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
The lioness carefully groomed her newborn baby.
words.defineEn: a child who is very young, usually too young to walk or speak
words.defineVi: một đứa trẻ còn rất nhỏ, thường còn quá nhỏ để đi hoặc nói

examples: The police had the situation well in hand.
The current situation is spelling disaster for the project.
We're watching the situation very carefully.
We're watching the situation very carefully.
This situation doesn't feel right.
words.defineEn: the way things are at a certain time or place, describing what is happening or how things are taking place
words.defineVi: cách mọi thứ diễn ra tại một thời điểm hoặc địa điểm nhất định, mô tả những gì đang xảy ra hoặc mọi thứ đang diễn ra như thế nào

examples: Language is a window into the world.
The poem uses simple language.
Use plain language instead of jargon.
Don’t use bad language.
The universal language of art is bridging a divide.
words.defineEn: the system of communication by spoken or written words, that is used by people of a particular country or region
words.defineVi: hệ thống giao tiếp bằng lời nói hoặc chữ viết, được sử dụng bởi những người của một quốc gia hoặc khu vực cụ thể

examples: Complaints must go through the proper channels.
We should go through the established channels for product development.
We can't get Channel 5 in our area.
But when it comes time to purchase, transactions often go through traditional channels.
To go through official channels to obtain one you must have a Spanish address.
words.defineEn: a TV station that broadcasts different programs
words.defineVi: một đài truyền hình phát sóng các chương trình khác nhau

examples: Tongues were wagging over their engagement.
Tongues wagged when another police car was parked in front of their house.
Snakes use their tongues to smell their surroundings.
Mother clicked her tongue and sighed.
I'm just biting my tongue for now.
words.defineEn: the soft movable part inside the mouth used for tasting something or speaking
words.defineVi: phần mềm di động bên trong miệng được sử dụng để nếm một cái gì đó hoặc nói

examples: The old lady walked slowly with the support of her cane.
The old lady's cake wasn't wonderful
Her affection for her grandson was written all over the old lady's face.
Cry me a river, I don't even have a cleaning lady.
Her coach reminded her that faint heart never won fair lady, and encouraged her to push her limits.
words.defineEn: a formal or polite word for referring to a woman
words.defineVi: một từ trang trọng hoặc lịch sự để đề cập đến một người phụ nữ

examples: The soldiers kept the attackers at bay.
Suddenly another soldier hits the dirt beside me.
The new soldiers had no stomach for a fight.
The tomb is guarded day and night by soldiers.
We must strike now that they are down to only a handful of soldiers!
words.defineEn: someone who serves in an army, particularly a person who is not an officer
words.defineVi: một người phục vụ trong quân đội, đặc biệt là một người không phải là một sĩ quan

examples: Crime doesn't pay.
The crime of obtaining title to another's property by false pretenses.
In these traditional stories, no crime goes unpunished.
The crime was committed in broad daylight.
Crime rates are soaring and our public transport system is beyond a joke.
words.defineEn: an illegal act that is punishable by law
words.defineVi: một hành động bất hợp pháp bị trừng phạt bởi pháp luật

examples: Does the price include tax?
The price includes dinner, bed, and breakfast.
Many shops have raised their prices.
International companies set the price of oil.
The exorbitant prices are explainable in light of the facts.
words.defineEn: the amount of money required for buying or obtaining something
words.defineVi: số tiền cần thiết để mua hoặc có được một cái gì đó
